meta.description: Determine the number of pills of supplements A and B to buy to meet daily iron and calcium requirements at minimum cost.

params.name: iron_content
params.description: Iron content per pill of each supplement.

params.name: calcium_content
params.description: Calcium content per pill of each supplement.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per pill of each supplement.

vars.name: pills
vars.description: Number of pills to buy for each supplement.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of buying supplements.

constraints.name: iron_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 40 units of iron are obtained.

constraints.name: calcium_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 50 units of calcium are obtained.
